messages.title: Angela’s Biscuit Boost!
messages.content: LABOUR’S Angela Eagle plays a vital role in saving jobs in Moreton by winning a big order at Burton's Biscuit factory that will protect the factory and local jobs.

messages.title: Local Tories Bankrolled by Debt Collector
messages.content: Wallasey Tory Party’s election campaign has been part-funded by controversial loan firm Wonga through high interest rates loans.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Leading economic experts have slammed Tory plans for immediate and deep cuts to public services. They say the Tory plans would put Britain's economic recovery at risk and could drag us back into recession with job losses and repossessions just like in the 1980s and 1990s.

issues.economy: Leading economic experts have slammed Tory plans for immediate and deep cuts to public services. They say the Tory plans would put Britain's economic recovery at risk and could drag us back into recession with job losses and repossessions just like in the 1980s and 1990s.
issues.health: The Tories will tell you that you would lose your right to see a specialist within two weeks if your GP suspects cancer. Tory-planned NHS 'reform' would put these plans at risk.
issues.socialWelfare: The Tory manifesto fails to guarantee continued free eye tests and prescriptions for senior citizens. Meanwhile the Tories opposed the introduction of the new Elderly Allowance and scrapped plans for over 75s even now leading Tories want them TV licenced, taxed or means-tested. David Cameron says pensioner benefits are safe with him. Local pensioners don’t believe it.

politicalExperience.role: Shadow Chief Secretary to the Treasury
politicalExperience.achievements: Angela is also busy as the Shadow Chief Secretary to the Treasury defending Labour's economic policy against Tory attacks.

images.caption: Angela Eagle & Sir Ron Watson at Burtons

leaflet.additionalNotes: Angela Eagle plays a vital role in saving jobs in Moreton by winning a big order at Burton's Biscuit factory that will protect the factory and local jobs. Angela also planted a cherry tree in Liscard Primary School.
